channel.title: [317] Modglow adding [317]
channel.description:
[b][size=17pt]Ok, i was looking forward to adding the command ::Modglow but i can't seem to add it.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~READ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ [color=blue]I searched help for this [0% found] I've looked threw topics but still can't find it [0%]
Could someone give me a link to adding it or Be willing to Give me a code for help.
TEAMVIEWER[/color] id: 459 425 589 pass: 4927[/size][/b]

item.title: [317] Modglow adding [317]
item.dc:creator: @delicious delicious
item.description:
@delicious wrote:

[quote=“Zanzibar, post:2, topic:322900”]Well , client.java–

public boolean modglow = false;

CMD

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("modglow") && playerRights >= 1) { modglow = true; }
Add the turn off command yourself.

Add the effect in public void process()

if (modglow == true) {//Mod Glow stillgfx(247, absY, absX); }[/quote]

it would be added in public boolean process() and not public void process()

Read full topic
